data.title: Aggressive Tiles Mosh Pit From Tree
data.description: Use this simple, but effective combination of utility to successfully disrupt Attackers from taking Mid control. It is recommended to coordinate this play with teammates at bottom Mid.

data.title: Early Round A Main Push Support
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to push A Main with your team at the very start of the round, and / or contest control of A Main.

data.title: Delay / Deny B Main Site Execute from Defender Spawn
data.description: Make sure to coordinate with your team to get the maximum value out of your utility as the enemy players push into Site.

data.title: A Retake Dizzy + Mosh Pit Lineups
data.description: Use these simple lineups to hold / retake A Site.

data.title: Hold Back B Site with this Mosh Pit + Dizzy Combo
data.description: Use this simple setup to hold down back B Site with a Mosh Pit and Dizzy.
